inst.name: SO

table.footer_content:
• 1 - Benches: Center Platform, Check Platform handrails
  • 5 - Sweeping: Entrance Area, Offices Area; Path from entrance until 'pray' sign, Steps to Dell
  • 2 - Benches: A,B,C,D,E
  • 6 - Sweeping: Bridge, in front of shop, Lower Platform, Steps to tomb, Cistern
  • 3 - Benches: Entrance Area, Dell, Arbour, Deck, Chapel Side, Check Chapel Chairs, Nook, Pines, Skull Hill seats.
  • 7 - Sweep tomb area, tomb, and winepress
  • 8 - NEW AREA! Sweep Peace sign to Skull Hill viewing platform
  • 4 - Benches: Lower Platform, Tomb area, Cistern, + Empty bins
  • C - Cookies
